title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXII, pt. 1100 - Public Access To Records
content:

§ 1100.5 - Prevention of unwarranted invasions of personal privacy
§ 1100.6 - Inspection and copying

N.Y. Comp. Codes

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, §88
[FN*] Rules formerly contained in this Part are now set forth
in Part 158, Chapter III, Subtitle D, Title
9. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
